text: Oliver Spencer Halstead (September 22, 1792 – August 29, 1877) was an American politician who served as the Mayor of Newark from 1840 to 1841. ==References== Category:1792 births Category:1877 deaths Category:Mayors of Newark, New Jersey Category:New Jersey Whigs Category:19th-century American politicians Category:Politicians from Elizabeth, New Jersey
title: Oliver Spencer Halstead
